bibl.title: The Poets Julia Balbilla and Damo at the Colossus of Memnon.
bibl.note: Offers a general historical and prosopographical introduction to two women poets who left couplets on the Memnon statue: Julia Balbilla who composed 4 poems in A.D. 130, while in the company of the emperor Hadrian and his wife Sabina (I. Col. Memnon 28-31), and Damo, author of 2 couplets (I. Col. Memnon 83).
bibl.seg: BRENNAN T.C., The Poets Julia Balbilla and Damo at the Colossus of Memnon.

Offers a general historical and prosopographical introduction to two women poets who left couplets on the Memnon statue: Julia Balbilla who composed 4 poems in A.D. 130, while in the company of the emperor Hadrian and his wife Sabina (I. Col. Memnon 28-31), and Damo, author of 2 couplets (I. Col. Memnon 83).
